block.p: Sharon Lesser, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Joseph S. Lesser of New York, was married last evening to Matthew Keown Maguire, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Richard K. Maguire III of Edina, Minn. Rabbi Charles D. Lippman performed the ceremony at the Metropolitan Club in New York.

Mrs. Maguire is a writer of on-the-air promotions for Nickelodeon Television in New York. She graduated cum laude from Middlebury College. Her father is the president and chief executive of Loeb Partners Realty in New York and the chairman of United Park City Mines, a real estate development company in Park City, Utah.

Sharon Lesser, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Joseph S. Lesser of New York, was married last evening to Matthew Keown Maguire, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Richard K. Maguire III of Edina, Minn. Rabbi Charles D. Lippman performed the ceremony at the Metropolitan Club in New York.

Mrs. Maguire is a writer of on-the-air promotions for Nickelodeon Television in New York. She graduated cum laude from Middlebury College. Her father is the president and chief executive of Loeb Partners Realty in New York and the chairman of United Park City Mines, a real estate development company in Park City, Utah.

Mr. Maguire is a vice president in the business retention division of the New York City Economic Development Corporation, where he oversees financing and tax assistance programs. He graduated from Dartmouth College and received a master's degree in public policy from Harvard. His father is an independent bank marketing consultant in Edina.
